content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Pointy End goes There You become wounded 1 or your wounded value increases by 1.

Melee
Tunnel Vision For 3 rounds, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, but you are flat-footed.

Ranged
Head First! You fall unconscious until you wake up or the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Wild Magic Roll twice on the rod of wonder table. You are the target of those effects.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #49
